Classification: Scripted
Genre: Drama
Status: Canceled/Ended
Network: ITV1 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Sundays at 08:30 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: January 29, 2006
Ended: December 30, 2012

Wild at Heart follows a suburban vet and his extended family as they try to re-invent their lives on a game park in the heart of Africa.
